Pb+Pb 5.02 TeV 30-50%, charm quark R_AA
 
1st column: 2.0-Kyle-full-T-matrix-A=1.6 K-factor on top of PLB735(2014) 

2nd column: revised A'(p,T)=K(T)*A(p,T), such that D\-(s)'(T)*2\g(p)T=4
---------------------------------------------------
